name: Nether-Attunement
desc: You feel a little odd and your control over your powers isn't as sure as it was.  There might be unexpected results of you channeling psionics now.
apply_message: You feel a little odd, like you've just awoken from a dream.  All that psionic channeling might have unexpected effects.
Your mind thrums with power.  It's intoxicating, but growing increasingly harder to control.
Your whole body pulses with a raging torrent of energy.  It's taking almost all of your concentration to hold on.
decay_messages: The constant hum of power fades, just a little.  It's easier to think now.
The roar of the Nether subsides.  You can finally hear your own thoughts again.
remove_message: You take a deep breath as the strange feelings fade.  You are in full control of your powers once again.

name: Observed
desc: You have the strong impression that someone, or something, is watching you.
remove_message: The endless feeling of being watched finally fades away.

//: Hidden effect, used as a tracker

name: Feedback
desc: You feel a persistent itching that will not go away.

//: Hidden effect, used as a tracker
Hidden effect, used as a tracker
